definition: the quality of being able -- physically or intellectually or legally
details:
noun
- the quality of being able -- physically or intellectually or legally
= example: the quality of being able -- physically or intellectually or legally
= synonyms: capableness
- an aptitude that may be developed
= synonyms: capableness, potentiality
- the susceptibility of something to a particular treatment
= example: the susceptibility of something to a particular treatment
= synonyms: capacity
